original: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhāyatanaṁ. Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhu ceva cakkhāyatanañca.

original: Dibbasotaṁ taṇhāsotaṁ sotaṁ, na sotāyatanaṁ. Sotāyatanaṁ sotañceva sotāyatanañca.

original: Kāyāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo, na kāyāyatanaṁ. Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyo ceva kāyāyatanañca.

original: Rūpāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ rūpaṁ, na rūpāyatanaṁ. Rūpāyatanaṁ rūpañceva rūpāyatanañca.

original: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho gandho, na gandhāyatanaṁ. Gandhāyatanaṁ gandho ceva gandhāyatanañca.

original: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso raso, na rasāyatanaṁ. Rasāyatanaṁ raso ceva rasāyatanañca.

original: Dhammāyatanaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammāyatanaṁ. Dhammāyatanaṁ dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañca.
